original_title: Riddle of the Stone Age Giants
overview: The discovery of Gobekli Tepe 20 years ago changed our understanding of the history of humankind. Now, newly-discovered skull carvings reveal even more about how and why civilized societies developed.
tagline: How the discovery of Gobekli Tepe changed the understanding of the history of humankind
title: Riddle of the Stone Age Giants
